alert.note: Alert for Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 11:52AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Bitterly Cold Start to the Week... .Arctic air will persist early this week with wind chills ranging from 20 below to 35 below zero. With some daytime temperature increase, wind chills may not be quite as low across parts of Wisconsin during the afternoon hours, but overall, much of this week will be quite cold. ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Wind chills as low as 30 to 35 below zero. * WHERE...Mower County. * WHEN...Until noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
